title: Can't post -- y'know, that thing.
body:
Well I read an earlier post that posting here might speed things up so here's hoping that works.  But yeah ~  My account meets the restriction levels of the roleplay section but can't post.

I'll take a peek after I post this and see if that's changed.. If not -- guess I wait and see..?  Unless someone else has any other ideas.  I hear this is a fairly common problem.

Anywho, thanks!

replies.body: It's possible your Summoner and Boards profile hadn't synced, but making this post may have resolved it for you. Check it on the Roleplay sub-board and let me know if you still have issues.
